net.datenwerke.rs.passwordpolicy.service

Class BsiPasswordPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.datenwerke.rs.passwordpolicy.service.BsiPasswordPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PasswordPolicy

    public class BsiPasswordPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements PasswordPolicy
    A password policy based on the recommendations from https://www.bsi.bund.de/ContentBSI/grundschutz/kataloge/m/m04/m04048.html
